comment.body: clowwindy disappeared NOT because Tor is a lie, just because clowwindy did not try to hide his/her identity when shadowsocks was first released. He/She thought it is just a personal network tool worth sharing.

THX for Chinese version, but as machine-translating it looks somewhat confusing , so my Chinese post about this critical security flaw: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/1538378762 （中文见此）
